channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree branch broken, 21st July
item.description:
Tree branch broken, blocking public footpath. Near bus stop in Court Road, by entrance to Priory Gardens.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Court Road, Poverest, London

item.title: Bags of green waste dumped inside fenced green space, 21st July
item.description:
Several bags of green waste dumped inside fenced green space by the parking bays of 3 Gautrey Road estate. They are stacked in the corner of the fenced area by the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 26, 21st July
item.description:
When another tree south of this one fell down, I reported it and added that the tree outside 26 PVE was dead. The fallen tree was cleared, then on Saturday, a Police tape was wound round the tree to the railings to stop anyone walking on that bit of pavement and a warning cone placed next to it. This morning, the police tape has been removed. This tree is DANGEROUS so please remove it as quickly as you can as clearly idiots think itâ€™s more important that they can walk on the pavement than that someone is killed or maimed by a falling tree, however small. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Park Village East, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown vegetation, 21st July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Farm Road, Mottingham, London

item.title: 62 - 82 Bins continue to be overflowing & left on street, 21st July
item.description:
